mapper.select: select ID id, USERNAME username, PASSWORD password, ROLE role, DISABLED disabled from operators
select ID id, USERNAME username, PASSWORD password, ROLE role, DISABLED disabled from operators where ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into operators(ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, ROLE) values(accounts_seq.nextval, #{username}, #{password}, #{role})
mapper.update: update operators set USERNAME = #{username}, PASSWORD = #{password}, ROLE = #{role}, DISABLED = #{disabled} where ID = #{id}
